Overview
This Chrome extension allows you to play the classic Gomoku game against the computer. The game is integrated directly into your browser for easy
access and quick gameplay.

Features
- Play Gomoku against an AI opponent.
- Simple and intuitive user interface.
- Quick access via the browser action button.
- No internet connection required to play.
